articles.description: The armed forces will be running the pop up testing centre
articles.content:
A mobile coronavirus testing centre will open in Reading this week.
Tests will be taking place from today (Thursday, May 14) on the car park next to Reading FC's Madejski Stadium.

articles.title: Tour of Britain 2020 has been cancelled due to the coronavirus pandemic - Cornwall Live
articles.description: The postponement of the race is an understandable development as we are dealing with the effects of a global pandemic
articles.content:
The 2020  Tour of Britain, which was due to start in Cornwall, has been cancelled because of the coronavirus pandemic.
The sporting event had been due to start in Penzance with a 170km stretch through the Duchy to Bodmin.
